text: Skewered goose liver () is a dish from southern Tel Aviv. It is seasoned with salt and black pepper and sometimes with spices like cumin, cinnamon, paprika, nutmeg, allspice and turmeric then grilled. ==See also== *Israeli cuisine *Offal ==References== Category:Israeli cuisine Category:Middle Eastern grilled meats Category:Skewered foods Category:Offal
title: Skewered goose liver
